Text.Page:
left to find the secret to controlling the Storm Barrier, leaving Zolyn and Paesyn behind, and found a hidden cave.

Inside the cave was an unknown gate guarded by the Archdevan Imperial Army.

Defeating the guards, learned that the gate was connected to the Energia Celo.

I watched you dispatch those archdevas outside, . I'm sorry I couldn't help, but I was ready to go for help, if you needed it!

Zolyn is on her way."Okay. When she gets here, tell her I've gone ahead."
